title.native: BanG Dream! ぽっぴん'どりーむ!

description:
After performing at the Budokan Live, the stage of their dreams, a mysterious woman appears before Kasumi and the others.

Poppin'Party's next stage will be... overseas?!

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Rock Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Aviation
tags.description: Regarding the flying or operation of aircraft.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

name.native: エレメンツ ガーデン

node.description:
__[Profile (Aria Entertainment)](https://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/)__

A Japanese group of music composers, or a "music production brand" as they call themselves. They generally produce music for video games, anime and recording artists. They are attached to Aria Entertainment.

__Current Members:__ 
[Noriyasu Agematsu](https://anilist.co/staff/103633/Noriyasu-Agematsu) (Producer/Lyricist/Composer)
[Junpei Fujita](https://anilist.co/staff/110557/Junpei-Fujita) (Producer/Composer/Arranger)
[Hitoshi Fujima](https://anilist.co/staff/101273/Hitoshi-Fujima) (Composer/Arranger)
[Daisuke Kikuta](https://anilist.co/staff/147815/Daisuke-Kikuta) (Composer/Arranger)
[Seima Iwahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/146530/Seima-Iwahashi) (Composer/Arranger/Director)
[Ryutaro Fujinaga](https://anilist.co/staff/155960/Ryutaro-Fujinaga) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Ryota Tomaru](https://anilist.co/staff/140532/Ryota-Tomaru) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yuta Kasai](https://anilist.co/staff/259881/Yuuta-Kasai) (Composer/Arranger)
[Yusuke Takeda](https://anilist.co/staff/156645/Yusuke-Takeda) (Lyricist/Composer)
[Asuka Oda](https://anilist.co/staff/155968/Asuka-Oda) (Lyricist)
[Seima Kondou](https://anilist.co/staff/239286/Seima-Kondou) (Composer/Arranger)

__Former Members:__ 
Yasutomo Nakai (2005-2006)
[Masato Nakayama](https://anilist.co/staff/112097/Masato-Nakayama) (2007-2013)
[Evan Call](https://anilist.co/staff/119999/Evan-Call) (2012-2016)
Tomohiro Kita (2011-2016), Haruki Mori (2009-2018)
[Ryouta Suemasu](https://anilist.co/staff/155969/Ryouta-Suemasu) (2014-2019)

Bushiroad Inc. (株式会社ブシロード, Kabushiki-gaisha Bushirōdo) is a Japanese entertainment company producer of collectible card games and trading cards, publisher of mobile apps and games, promotional items and many other venues, which was founded in 2007 by Takaaki Kidani and is headquartered in Tokyo.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/bushi_PR)

Poppin'Party is an all-girl band in the BanG Dream! franchise. The group consists of five members:
- [Aimi](https://anilist.co/staff/109519/Aimi-Terakawa) (as [Kasumi Toyama](https://anilist.co/character/120229/)) on rhythm guitar and vocals
- [Sae Otsuka](https://anilist.co/staff/120235/) (as [Tae Hanazono](https://anilist.co/character/120232/)) on lead guitar
- [Rimi Nishimoto](https://anilist.co/staff/120234/Rimi-Nishimoto) (as [Rimi Ushigome](https://anilist.co/character/120231/)) on bass
- [Ayaka Ohashi](https://anilist.co/staff/110903/Ayaka-Ohashi) (as [Saaya Yamabuki](https://anilist.co/character/120233/)) on drums
- [Ayasa Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/118799/Ayasa-Itou) (as [Arisa Ichigaya](https://anilist.co/character/120230/)) on keyboard and tambourine

Poppin'Party first started out with Aimi, Rimi Nishimoto, and Ayasa Itou, before adding the other two members to become a full band. They debuted with the song "Yes! BanG_Dream!".

__[Profile](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/elements-garden/fujita/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Junpei_Fujita)__

Member of the "music production brand" Elements Garden.

[Website](http://www.nakamurakou.com/) | [Blog](http://kou.livedoor.biz/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nkkou)

Kou Nakamura is a novelist and winner of the 39th Bungei Prize in 2002. He also won the Noma Literary Newcomer Prize in 2004.

[Official Website ](http://www.ariamusic.co.jp/) | [Twitter ](https://twitter.com/agematsu)

Noriyasu Agematsu is the founding member of the musical group Elements Garden.

Along with his fellow Elements Garden members, he is the composer and arranger for the BanG Dream! franchise, including overseeing music production for its anime.
